name: Space Power Defender LDJAM39 version
description:
GAME MADE DURING LUDUM DARE 39

----------

You can check out the post Ludum Dare version here.

----------

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/space-power-defender

edwingamedev.com

Space Shooter where your power is exposed and you have to protect it from the enemy waves.

Every time you lose a power, your Spaceship becomes weaker.

Every 3 waves you recover your power.

GOOD LUCK HAVE FUN!

Controls: 

//keyboard 

ARROW KEYS, WASD: Movement 

SPACE BAR: Shoot
